_comment: Examples of standardized error responses for different API error scenarios.

bad_request.message: Invalid input data. Please check your request body and parameters.

details.message: Must be a valid email address.
Must be at least 8 characters long.

unauthorized.message: Authentication required to access this resource.
unauthorized.details: Invalid API key or missing authentication token.

forbidden._comment: User does not have permission to access the resource
forbidden.message: You do not have permission to access this resource.

not_found.message: The requested resource was not found.

method_not_allowed._comment: HTTP method not supported for this resource
method_not_allowed.message: The specified HTTP method is not allowed for this resource.
method_not_allowed.details: Only GET requests are allowed on this endpoint.

conflict.details: A user with this email address already exists.

unprocessable_entity._comment: Validation failed on the server side
unprocessable_entity.message: The request could not be processed due to validation errors.

too_many_requests.message: You have exceeded the rate limit for this API.
too_many_requests.details: Please wait before making another request.

internal_server_error.message: An unexpected error occurred on the server.
internal_server_error.details: Please try again later or contact support.

service_unavailable.details: The server is temporarily overloaded or under maintenance.
